cherry_blossom.name: Cherry Blossom
cherry_blossom.short: A sweet and spicy aroma of rich cherry liqueur and spring flowers.
cherry_blossom.full:
An intensely saturated fragrance that enhances the entire atmosphere of the room. The top notes of cherry and bitter almond evolve into a vibrant, tangy cherry liqueur scent. Rose and jasmine accords blend into a soft floral trail, enriched with a sweet touch of vanilla.

You'll fall in love with CHERRY BLOSSOM if you enjoy delicate, sweet fragrances and the scent of ripe, juicy cherries.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top notes: Cherry, Liqueur, Bitter almond
Heart notes: Cherry, Turkish rose, Jasmine sambac, Plum
Base notes: Peru balsam, Tonka beans, Sandalwood, Vetiver, Vanilla

bellini.name: Bellini
bellini.short: A velvety scent of juicy peach and intense rum.
bellini.full:
This powdery fragrance, rich in aromatic compounds, quickly fills your space with playful notes of sweet peach, blood orange and vanilla. The bitter-spicy accords of cognac, rum and cashmere add a subtle edge and deepen its character.

BELLINI is perfect if you want to maintain a festive, celebratory atmosphere.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top Notes: Peach, Blood Orange, Cardamom, Heliotrope
Heart Notes: Rum, Cognac, Davana, Jasmine
Base Notes: Patchouli, Sandalwood, Vanilla, Tonka Bean

eden.name: Eden
eden.short: A fruity fragrance with a soft floral trail.
eden.full:
Intense and vibrant, this aroma fills the entire space. Passion fruit and raspberry notes unfold into a juicy, fresh scent of ripe fruits and berries. Sweetness is enhanced by lily and vanilla accords.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top notes: Passion fruit, Peach, Pear, Raspberry
Heart notes: Lily
Base notes: Vanilla, Musk, Sandalwood

rosso.name: Rosso
rosso.short: A lush aroma of ripe red grapes and juicy berries.
rosso.full:
This fragrance fills the entire space with a vegetal scent of raspberry and birch bark. The dominant accord of juicy red grapes permeates the room with the penetrating aroma of dry wine.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top notes: Orange, Violet, Magnolia
Heart notes: Plum, Strawberry, Wild berries
Base notes: Dry wood, Birch

salted_caramel.name: Salted Caramel
salted_caramel.short: A bright composition with notes of wheat and vanilla.
salted_caramel.full:
Notes of wheat and vanilla fill the fragrance with sweetness and a delicious, mouthwatering trail. Caramel and salt blend into a rich, enveloping scent familiar from childhood.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top notes: Sea salt
Heart notes: Pear, Vanilla, Powdery notes, Wheat
Base notes: Toffee, Brown sugar

santal.name: Santal
santal.short: A powdery fragrance with leather, cardamom, and oriental sandalwood.
santal.full:
This aromatic scent diffuses slowly and gently throughout the space. Emerging notes of cardamom and sandalwood blend with strong accords of iris and amber.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top notes: Sandalwood, Papyrus, Leather
Heart notes: Virginia cedar, Cardamom, Violet
Base notes: Iris, Amber

lime_basil.name: Lime Basil
lime_basil.short: A fresh citrus scent of juicy lime and aromatic basil.
lime_basil.full:
This intensely saturated fragrance quickly unfolds in the air. Notes of lime and ripe mandarin create a slightly sweet aroma, while spicy basil and thyme accords dissolve into pleasant bitterness.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top notes: Mandarin, Bergamot
Heart notes: Basil, Iris, Lilac, Thyme
Base notes: Lime, Patchouli, Vetiver

bamboo.name: Bamboo
bamboo.short: A green, fresh scent of spring flowers and bamboo stalks.
bamboo.full:
This moderately intense fragrance gently fills your space without overpowering it. Top notes of bergamot and bamboo create a delicate vegetal mist.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top Notes: Bamboo, Bergamot
Heart Notes: Ylang-ylang, Lily, Orange Blossom
Base Notes: Vanilla, Sandalwood, Amber

tobacco_vanilla.name: Tobacco Vanilla
tobacco_vanilla.short: A warm and smooth scent of tobacco leaves and sweet vanilla.
tobacco_vanilla.full:
Notes of spices and tobacco leaves gradually unfold into a rich, delicate vanilla and cocoa scent. The trail is revealed with light woody bark and dried fruit notes.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top notes: Tobacco leaves, Spices
Heart notes: Tonka beans, Vanilla, Cocoa, Tobacco flower
Base notes: Woody notes, Dried fruits

salty_water.name: Salty Water
salty_water.short: A fresh scent of salty water and ancient minerals.
salty_water.full:
This is a light-intensity fragrance, the most delicate of the entire line. Marine salt and amber dissolve into a refreshing salty dew aroma.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top notes: Amber, Sea salt
Heart notes: Sage
Base notes: Grapefruit, Seaweed

christmas_tree.name: Christmas Tree
christmas_tree.short: A soft and festive scent of Christmas pine and juicy tangerines.
christmas_tree.full:
This is a medium-intensity fragrance that gently fills the room. The bright and sweet tangerine note unfolds into a familiar and nostalgic aroma.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top notes: Vanilla
Heart notes: Orange, Cinnamon
Base notes: Pine, Tangerine

fleur.name: Fleur
fleur.full:
The composition opens with bright notes of bergamot, lychee, and peach, leading into a floral heart of orange blossom, jasmine, and peony.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top notes: Bergamot, Lychee, Peach
Heart notes: Orange blossom, Jasmine, Peony
Base notes: Woody notes, Moss, Musk

blanc.name: Blanc
blanc.short: A soft, fresh fragrance of white cotton and purity.
blanc.full:
This moderately concentrated scent blends light floral accords with bright aldehydes, evoking the aroma of a crisp white shirt and freshly laundered sheets.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top Notes: Aldehydes, Rose, Pink Pepper
Heart Notes: Peony, Violet, Orange Blossom
Base Notes: White Musk, Woody Notes, Sandalwood

green_mango.name: Green Mango
green_mango.short: A juicy fragrance of fresh mango and crisp pineapple.
green_mango.full:
This highly concentrated scent fills the entire space with bright and fresh aroma of freshly cut fruits.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top notes: Mango, Melon
Heart notes: Peach, Pineapple
Base notes: Mango peel, Pine needles

carolina.name: Carolina
carolina.short: A delicate, light aroma of sweet cappuccino and spring blooms.
carolina.full:
Coffee and almond notes dissolve into a warm, enveloping sweet-bitter accord. Jasmine, iris and bergamot create fresh floral highlights.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top Notes: Almond, Coffee, Bergamot, Lemon
Heart Notes: Jasmine sambac, Tuberose, Iris, Bulgarian Rose
Base Notes: Tonka Bean, Cocoa, Sandalwood, Vanilla

sugar.name: Sugar
sugar.short: A sweet and sticky scent of burnt sugar and woody resin.
sugar.full:
Pronounced notes of saffron and jasmine melt into a sweet and spicy aroma. The main woody amber accord envelops the air with sweetness.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top notes: Jasmine, Saffron
Heart notes: Woody amber
Base notes: White cedar, Pine resin

dubai.name: Dubai
dubai.short: A rich oriental fragrance of Damask rose and oud wood.
dubai.full:
An intense and highly concentrated aroma. Notes of geranium and violet gently envelop the space with a slightly bitter floral scent.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top notes: Geranium, Violet
Heart notes: Cinnamon, Damask rose, Turkish rose
Base notes: Oud, Vanilla

africa.name: Africa
africa.short: A warm, spicy scent of cardamom wood and soft leather.
africa.full:
This intensely concentrated fragrance fills the entire room. Bright notes of bergamot and musk are enhanced by a luminous woody nuance.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top Notes: Bergamot, Vetiver, Geranium
Heart Notes: Cardamom, Leather, Musk
Base Notes: Patchouli, Cumin, Oud, Saffron

dune.name: Dune
dune.short: A bold and spicy scent of blazing sun and hot pepper.
dune.full:
Citrus notes of orange and grapefruit add a pleasantly sweet trail. Distinct pepper accords dissolve into a bright, fiery aroma.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top notes: Orange, Grapefruit
Heart notes: Pepper, Pink Pepper
Base notes: Vetiver, Cedar, Patchouli, Benzoin

valencia.name: Valencia
valencia.short: An airy fragrance of fresh citrus and delicate jasmine.
valencia.full:
Notes of lemon and bergamot fill the space with a fresh citrus scent. The main accords of jasmine and rose melt into a sweet floral composition.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top notes: Bergamot, Lemon
Heart notes: Jasmine, White Acacia, Rose
Base notes: Woody notes, Musk

etna.name: Etna
etna.short: A spicy and warm aroma of leather, tobacco, and caramel.
etna.full:
Strong leather and black pepper notes emerge instantly, while clove, sage, and honey blend into an intense composition.

Olfactory Pyramid:
Top notes: Leather, Saffron, Black pepper
Heart notes: Honey, Clove, Iris, Sage
Base notes: Tobacco, Oud, Caramel, Patchouli

new_york.name: New York
new_york.short: A vibrant party, sharp cocktails, and spicy freshness.
new_york.full:
Your night will be remembered by the scent of dark wood, smoky amber, and bold citrus notes.

Volume: 270 ml
Burn time: approx. 40 hours

abu_dhabi.name: Abu Dhabi
abu_dhabi.short: Embracing warm nights under a starlit sky.
abu_dhabi.full:
Rich spicy notes blend with gentle lavender and a lush bouquet of florals.

Volume: 270 ml
Burn time: approx. 40 hours

palermo.name: Palermo
palermo.short: Gentle rays of sunshine and refreshing coastal breeze.
palermo.full:
Radiant notes of mandarin and bitter orange blend with the soft scent of peonies and vibrant basil.

Volume: 270 ml
Burn time: approx. 40 hours
